name: MEC Mass Transit Shorts - Men's
description:
Trusty bike shorts for committed commuters, tourers and two-wheeled explorers. A sewn-in basic chamois provides light padding for your seat, so you can ride in comfort and take the long way home.Made of durable nylon, polyester and spandex.Chamois is shaped and uses multiple thickness to provide comfort.8-panel construction for a cycle-specific fit.Drawcord at the waist.Non-intrusive flat-lock seams.Reflective details for visibility when the ride goes longer than expected.

Body fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
